Articles.Content:
If you tend to listen to non-default music (spotify, youtube, whatever) while playing KSP, please do tell what your favourites are!

And if you have specific music for reentry and the like, tell us too! (Probably the only one who does this lol, have a tendancy to listen to "Faded" by Alan Walker on reentry)

^^^ Brief extert from my playlist, with at least one song added in for complete irony (and being a complete banger...) ^^^

Edited July 27 by Natelolzzz
